homeScreenTemplate:
<style class="ng-scope">
  .promptumenu_window {
    display: none !important;
  }
  
  .verticalSpace {
    margin-top: 25px;
  }
  
  .navbar-absolute-top {
    display: none;
  }
</style>

<script>
  try {
    $("#mainSidebar").css('background', '#232323 !important');

    if ($.jStorage.get("userdetails") != null && $.jStorage.get("userdetails") != undefined) {
      var e = document.getElementsByClassName("app")[0];
      var $injector = angular.element(e).injector();
      var $location = $injector.get('$location');
      $location.path("/app/Home4/Home4");
    } else {
      var e = document.getElementsByClassName("app")[0];
      var $injector = angular.element(e).injector();
      var $location = $injector.get('$location');
      $location.path("/app/SignIn2/SignIn2");
    }
  } catch (e) {
    alert(e)
  }
</script>


<script>
  MyCampusApp.rootScope.animatepage = function(currentstyle) {
    $(".app-body").addClass(currentstyle);
  }

  function getRandomInt(min, max) {
    return Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min + 1)) + min;
  }
  var animstyles = ["slideInDown", "slideInUp", "slideInLeft", "slideInRight", "zoomInUp", "zoomInDown", "zoomInRight", "zoomInLeft", "rotateInDownLeft", "rotateInDownRight", "rotateInUpLeft", "rotateInUpRight", "bounceInDown", "bounceInUp", "bounceInRight", "bounceInLeft", "fadeInDown", "fadeInUp", "fadeInRight", "fadeInLeft", "flipInX", "flipInY", "rollIn"];
  //MyCampusApp.rootScope.animstyles; = animstyles;
  var currentstyle = "";
  var hideInterval = setInterval(function() {
    var animatecss = $("#animatecss");
    if (!animatecss || animatecss.length <= 0) {
      $.ajax({
        url: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/daneden/animate.css/master/animate.css",
        dataType: "text",
        success: function(data) {
          $("head").append("<style id='animatecss'>" + data + "</style>");
          clearInterval(hideInterval);
        }
      });
    }
  }, 2000);
  if (!MyCampusApp.rootScope.cangelistadded) {
    MyCampusApp.rootScope.$on("$routeChangeStart", function(event, next, current) {
      //alert(event);
      //alert("route change start");
      for (var i = 0; i < animstyles.length; i++) {
        $(".app-body").removeClass(animstyles[i]);
      }

      //$(".app-body").addClass("animated");
      //$(".app-body").addClass("slideOutUp");

    });
    MyCampusApp.rootScope.$on("$routeChangeSuccess", function(event, next, current) {
      //alert(event);

      currentstyle = animstyles[getRandomInt(0, 22)];
      //alert("route change success " + currentstyle);
      //$(".app-body").addClass(currentstyle);
      //$(".app-body").addClass("animated");
      //$(".app-body").removeClass("slideOutUp");
    });
    MyCampusApp.rootScope.cangelistadded = true;
  }

  try {
    //alert(JSON.stringify($.jStorage.get("userdetails")));

    var profiledata = $.jStorage.get("userdetails");
    if (profiledata != null && profiledata != undefined) {
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.userProfileName = profiledata.firstname + " " + profiledata.lastname;
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.useremail = profiledata.email;
      if (profiledata.img == undefined) {
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.userProfilePic = 'images/profileImage.png';
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.showUploadPhoto = true;
      } else {
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.userProfilePic = profiledata.img;
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.showUploadPhoto = false;
      }
      if (profiledata.studentRole == '' || profiledata.studentRole == undefined) {
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.studentRole = "Role";
      } else {
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.studentRole = profiledata.studentRole;
      }
    }
  } catch (e) {
    alert(e)
  }

  try {
    var tenantID = "DIT";

    var data = {
      tenant: tenantID,
      max: 20,
      offset: 0
    };
    //$.jStorage.set("pushOldCounts",0);
    var xhr = $.ajax({
      url: "https://kryptos.kryptosmobile.com/gateway/CEAI/kryptospushlog",
      contentType: 'application/json',
      type: "POST",
      headers: {
        'licenseKey': 'UjpIaWVDVzpTOjE0NDk0ODk2MzUxMzE6VTpha0BjYW1wdXNlYWkub3JnOlQ6NDpQOjI4Ng=='
      },
      data: JSON.stringify(data),
      success: function(data) {
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.pushCounts = data.paging.total;
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.pushData = data;

        var oldCounts = $.jStorage.get("pushOldCounts");

        if (oldCounts == null || oldCounts == undefined) {
          //var oldCounts = $rootScope.pushCounts;
          MyCampusApp.rootScope.NewPush = MyCampusApp.rootScope.pushCounts;
          //$.jStorage.set("pushOldCounts",$rootScope.pushCounts);
        } else {
          var oldCounts = $.jStorage.get("pushOldCounts");
          MyCampusApp.rootScope.NewPush = MyCampusApp.rootScope.pushCounts - oldCounts;
          //$.jStorage.set("pushOldCounts",$rootScope.pushCounts);
        }

        if (MyCampusApp.rootScope.NewPush <= 0) {
          MyCampusApp.rootScope.ShowPushCounts = false;
        } else {
          MyCampusApp.rootScope.ShowPushCounts = true;
        }
        //alert($rootScope.NewPush);
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.notificationCounts = MyCampusApp.rootScope.NewPush;
      },
      error: function(err) {}
    });
  } catch (e) {
    alert(e)
  }

  var onBackKeyDown = function(event) {
    if ($("body").hasClass("sidebar-left-in")) {
      event.preventDefault();
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.toggle("mainSidebar");
      if (MyCampusApp.rootScope.blackOverlay == false) {
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.blackOverlay = true;
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.$apply();
      } else {
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.blackOverlay = false;
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.$apply();
      }
      return;
    } else {

      var loc = window.location;

      if (loc.hash == "#/app/Home4/Home4" || loc.hash == "#/app/SignIn2/SignIn2") {
        navigator.app.exitApp();
        /*var onConfirm = function(buttonIndex) {
            if (buttonIndex == 1) {
                
            }
        };
        if (window.device) {
            navigator.notification.confirm(
                'Are you sure you want to exit?', // message
                onConfirm, // callback to invoke with index of button pressed
                'Just Confirming', // title
                ['Yes', 'No'] // buttonLabels
            );
        } else {
            apprise("Are you sure you want to exit?", {
                'verify': true,
                'textYes': "Yes",
                'textNo': "No"
            }, function(r) {
                if (r) {
                    navigator.app.exitApp();
                } else MyCampusApp.modalDialogDisplayed = false;
            });
        }*/
      } else if (loc.hash == "#/app/IIITDMobile/IIITDMobile") {
        //alert("signuo");
      } else {
        navigator.app.backHistory();
      }
    }

  }
  document.addEventListener("backbutton", onBackKeyDown, true);
</script>

<style>
  #fixedHeaderContent {
    display: none;
  }
  
  .footerGroupIcons div div {
    -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
    /* Chrome, Safari, Opera */
    filter: grayscale(100%);
  }
  
  .backButtonArrow {
    display: none;
  }
  
  .app-body {
    background-color: #efefef;
    background: #efefef;
  }
  
  @import url(http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,700italic,300,400,700);
  .openSans {
    font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
  }
  
  .select-style {
    padding: 0px;
    width: 100%;
    overflow: hidden;
    background: #fff url('data:image/png;base64,') no-repeat 97% 50%;
  }
  
  .select-styleSmall {
    padding: 0px;
    width: 100%;
    overflow: hidden;
    background: #fff url('data:image/png;base64,') no-repeat 93% 50%;
  }
  
  .select-styleSmall select {
    padding: 12px 8px;
    width: 130%;
    border: none;
    box-shadow: none;
    background: transparent;
    background-image: none;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    color: #999 !important;
  }
  
  .select-style select {
    padding: 12px 8px;
    width: 130%;
    border: none;
    box-shadow: none;
    background: transparent;
    background-image: none;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    color: #999 !important;
  }
  
  .select-style select:focus {
    outline: none;
  }
  
  .select-styleSmall select:focus {
    outline: none;
  }
  
  input[type="text"] {
    color: #9599a7 !important;
    padding: 12px 12px;
    border: 0px;
  }
  
  .form-control {
    height: auto !important;
  }
  
  .icons {
    width: 21%;
  }
  
  @media only screen and (min-device-width: 320px) and (max-device-width: 568px) {
    input[type="text"] {
      color: #9599a7 !important;
      padding: 12px 8px;
      border: 0px;
    }
    .icons {
      width: 24%;
    }
  }
  
  .overlay .overlay-inner > .overlay-background {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    z-index: 1040;
    margin: -5px -5px -5px -5px;
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, .8);
    opacity: 0.01;
  }
  /*==================================================
 * Effect 7
 * ===============================================*/
  
  .effect7 {
    position: relative;
    -webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
    -moz-box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
    box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
  }
  
  .effect7:before,
  .effect7:after {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    z-index: -1;
    -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
    -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
    box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 10px;
    right: 10px;
    -moz-border-radius: 100px / 10px;
    border-radius: 100px / 10px;
  }
  
  .effect7:after {
    right: 10px;
    left: auto;
    -webkit-transform: skew(8deg) rotate(3deg);
    -moz-transform: skew(8deg) rotate(3deg);
    -ms-transform: skew(8deg) rotate(3deg);
    -o-transform: skew(8deg) rotate(3deg);
    transform: skew(8deg) rotate(3deg);
  }
  
  .list-group {
    margin-bottom: 0px !important;
  }
</style>
<div style="padding:0px;" class="openSans">
  <div style="padding:40px 20px 20px 20px;width:100%;height:300px;background: url('data:image/jpeg;base64,') no-repeat center -20px;">


    <div style="padding:15px 0px;text-align: center;font-size:18px;width:auto;margin-top: 40px;">
      <!--<img src='images/profileImage.png' />-->
      <div style="position: absolute;top: 65px;left: 0;z-index: 100;text-align: center;margin: auto;width: 100%;">
        <div style="height:90px;width:90px;overflow: hidden;border-radius: 3px;margin:auto;">
          <img style="width:100%;min-height:90px;max-width:90px;" id="userImage" ng-src='{{userProfilePic}}' />
        </div>
        <div style="width:100%;position:absolute;bottom:4px;text-align: center;font-size:12px;color:#fff;" ng-show="showUploadPhoto" class="ng-hide"><span>Upload Photo</span></div>
      </div>

      <div style="background: #fff;border-radius:3px;margin-top: 15px;padding: 60px 5px 12px 5px;" class="effect7">
        <div style="text-align:center;line-height: 23px;">
          <div style="color:#434443;font-weight: 100;"><span ng-hide="showdefaultDN">{{userProfileDN}}</span><span ng-show="showdefaultDN">Display Name</span></div>

          <div style="color:#434443;font-weight: bold;"><span style='display: inline-block;' ng-hide="showdefaultUR">{{studentRole}}</span><span style='display: inline-block;' ng-show="showdefaultUR">Role</span></div>

          <div style="color:#6f6f6f;font-size:13px;font-weight: 100;"><span style='display: inline-block;' ng-hide="showdefaultInstitute" ng-bind='InstitutionName'></span><span style='display: inline-block;' ng-show="showdefaultInstitute"></span></div>

        </div>
        <div style="position:absolute;top:5px;z-index: 200;right:8px;color:#3eada7;font-size:12px;font-weight: bold;" ng-click="editProfile()" class='linkColor'><i class="fa fa-pencil"></i> Edit</div>
      </div>

    </div>
    <div style="background: #fff;border-radius:3px;padding: 12px;" class="effect7">
      <div style="color:#6f6f6f;font-size: 15px;">Personal Details</div>
      <div class="list-group" style="margin-top: 5px;">
        <div class='list-group-item' style='padding:7px 0;color:#4344443;border:none;font-weight:bold;'>Gender<span class='pull-right' style="color:#6f6f6f;font-weight:normal" ng-bind="gender"></span></div>

        <div class='list-group-item' style='padding:7px 0;color:#4344443;border:none;font-weight:bold;'>DoB<span class='pull-right' style="color:#6f6f6f;font-weight:normal" ng-bind='dob'></span></div>

        <div class='list-group-item' style='padding:7px 0;color:#4344443;border:none;font-weight:bold;'>Mobile Number<span class='pull-right' style="color:#6f6f6f;font-weight:normal" ng-bind='phn'></span></div>

        <div class='list-group-item' style='padding:7px 0;color:#4344443;border:none;font-weight:bold;'>Email<span class='pull-right' style="color:#6f6f6f;font-weight:normal" ng-bind="useremail"></span></div>

        <div class='list-group-item' style='padding:7px 0;color:#4344443;border:none;font-weight:bold;'>Facebook ID<span class='pull-right' style="color:#6f6f6f;font-weight:normal" ng-bind='fbID'></span></div>

        <div class='list-group-item' style='padding:7px 0;color:#4344443;border:none;font-weight:bold;'>LinkedIn ID<span class='pull-right' style="color:#6f6f6f;font-weight:normal" ng-bind='linkedInID'></span></div>

        <div class='list-group-item' style='padding:7px 0;color:#4344443;border:none;font-weight:bold;'>Google ID<span class='pull-right' style="color:#6f6f6f;font-weight:normal" ng-bind='googleID'></span></div>

      </div>
      <div style="position:absolute;top:5px;right:8px;color:#3eada7;font-size:12px;font-weight: bold;" ng-click="editPersonalInfo()" class='linkColor'><i class="fa fa-pencil"></i> Edit</div>
    </div>
    <div style="background: #fff;border-radius:3px;margin-top: 15px;padding: 12px;" class="effect7">
      <div style="color:#6f6f6f;font-size: 15px;font-weight: 100;">Education</div>
      <div class="list-group" style="margin-top: 5px;">
        <div class='list-group-item' style='padding:7px 0;color:#4344443;border:none;font-weight:bold;'>Roll #<span class='pull-right' style="color:#6f6f6f;font-weight:normal" ng-bind='rollNo'></span></div>
        <div class='list-group-item' style='padding:7px 0;color:#4344443;border:none;font-weight:bold;'>Degree/Course<span class='pull-right' style="color:#6f6f6f;font-weight:normal" ng-bind="course"></span></div>
        <div class='list-group-item' style='padding:7px 0;color:#4344443;border:none;font-weight:bold;'>Major/Stream<span class='pull-right' style="color:#6f6f6f;font-weight:normal" ng-bind="stream">Male</span></div>
        <!--<div class='list-group-item' style='padding:7px 0;color:#4344443;border:none;font-weight:bold;'>Course Taken<span class='pull-right' style="color:#6f6f6f;font-weight:normal">Male</span></div>-->
        <div class='list-group-item' style='padding:7px 0;color:#4344443;border:none;font-weight:bold;'>GPA / Grades<span class='pull-right' style="color:#6f6f6f;font-weight:normal" ng-bind="gpa"></span></div>

      </div>
      <div style="position:absolute;top:5px;right:8px;color:#3eada7;font-size:12px;font-weight: bold;" ng-click="editEducation()" class='linkColor'><i class="fa fa-pencil"></i> Edit</div>
    </div>
    <!--<div style="background: #fff;border-radius:3px;margin-top: 15px;padding: 12px;" class="effect7" ng-show="showSocialTab">
            <div style="color:#6f6f6f;font-size: 15px;font-weight: 100;">Social</div>
            <div class="list-group" style="margin-top: 5px;">
                <div class='list-group-item' style='padding:7px 0;color:#4344443;border:none;font-weight:bold;'>Student Orgs<span class='pull-right' style="color:#6f6f6f;font-weight:normal" ng-bind='studentOrgs'></span></div>
                <div class='list-group-item' style='padding:7px 0;color:#4344443;border:none;font-weight:bold;'>Interests<span class='pull-right' style="color:#6f6f6f;font-weight:normal" ng-bind='interest'></span></div>
                <div class='list-group-item' style='padding:7px 0;color:#4344443;border:none;font-weight:bold;'>Connections<span class='pull-right' style="color:#6f6f6f;font-weight:normal" ng-bind='Connection'></span></div>
            </div>
            <div style="position:absolute;top:5px;right:5px;color:#3eada7;font-size:12px;font-weight: bold;" class='linkColor'><i class="fa fa-pencil"></i> Edit</div>
        </div>

        <div style="background: #fff;border-radius:3px;margin-top: 15px;padding: 12px;" class="effect7" ng-hide="showSocialTab">
            <div style="color:#6f6f6f;font-size: 15px;font-weight: 100;">Social</div>
            <br>
            <div style="text-align:center;font-weight:bold;">LET'S SET YOU UP FOR</div>
            <div style="text-align:center;color:#6f6f6f;">Student Orgs, Interests and Connections</div>
            <div style="text-align:center;" ng-click="facebookSync()"><img src='images/facebook.jpg' /></div>
            <div style="text-align:center;" ng-click="linkedInSync()"><img src='images/linkedin.jpg' /></div>
        </div>
    -->
    <br>
    <br>
    <br>
    <br>
    <br>

  </div>
</div>

Education
Roll #
Degree/Course
Major/Stream
GPA / Grades

Welcome to DIT University's Official Mobile App

Create an account in a few easy steps


By signing up you agree to our End User License Agreement, Master Terms of Service and that you have read our Privacy Policy.


Enter your email address

You will use this email when you log in and if you ever need to reset the password


    • What's your name?

    Using your real name makes it easier for people to recognize you.


    • Enter your profile details

    Filling out these details will help you establish your unique identity.


    • Choose a password

    Remember this password. A password helps prevent strangers from using your account.


    • Verify your account

    If you have not received the OTP on your registered phone number, Click here to resend




    • Creating account

    Privacy Policy

    We at DIT University value your privacy and understand how important it is for you. To that effect, we have the following privacy policy in place with regard to the collection, use and dissemination of personal information submitted to this website. This document will help you understand the terms and conditions under which personal information is provided to this website. Please note that this policy is effective only within DIT University domain, and does not apply to websites that may be accessible from external links suggested at various pages of this website. Please note that due to the very nature of internet technology and evolving threats, this policy may be updated from time to time. All such updates will be posted in the privacy policy page. By using this website, you indicate your acceptance of the terms and policies mentioned here.

    Information Collection and Use. While you can use parts of this website without providing any personal information, certain sections will only be accessible after you have registered with the website by providing specific data. These sections include, but are not limited to Donations, Registration for academic courses, Books, Journals and Alumni Profiles. The information collected by DIT University will be used strictly for the purpose stated at the time of collection. Such information will not be sold, traded, rented or in any way transferred to a third party, including direct marketing companies and similar organizations for commercial purposes. However, DIT University may reveal the collected information to its selected employees, agents, consultants and others who the DIT University believes should know. The Institute may also divulge the information to law enforcement authorities, courts and such others if need arises.

    System Information Including IP Addresses. Information that is not personal in nature, i.e., IP addresses, web browsers and operating system details, browsing habits, demo-graphical and geographic data and other similar information may be logged and used to analyze and extrapolate information about general user behavior within the DIT University website. Such extrapolations and statistics may be made public. However, they cannot be tracked to individual users. IP addresses are not linked to anything that can help identify the user. Neither are IP addresses, except in rare occasions, handed out to a third party.

    Cookies.

    This website uses cookies to track usage and manage services on the website. Cookies are small bits of data that may be transferred to the users hard drive when they log in or access a particular part of the website. These are used for a variety of purposes including authentication and can be blocked by reconfiguring the appropriate settings in users web browser. Doing so, however, may restrict access to certain parts of the website. Through their browser options the user can remove the cookies from their hard disk. Information collected through cookies cannot be traced back to the user as it contains no personally identifiable data like name, address or phone number.

    Online Forms. The DIT University website uses online forms where you may be asked to provide certain bits of personal information. This is necessary to access certain services in the website (e.g. academic courses, donations, registrations, books and Journals) or to take part in surveys. By filling out and submitting the form you are understood to have consented to DIT University storing and using the information for the purposes for which it has been collected.

    Security. At DIT University , we take every possible precaution to ensure that your data is safe and secure barring circumstances beyond our control. Unfortunately, we cannot guarantee control over the medium of transmission i.e., internet. Though you have to supply the necessary information at your own risk, DIT University will always try to ensure the security and safety of the same. Once we receive the data, we will strive to keep it secure using the latest technology, constant upgrades to our digital security infrastructure and restricted access. All information you provide us will be stored in DIT University secured servers within DIT University premises.

pages.pageprocessor: function pageprocessorIIITDMobilePage5(pagedef, $scope, $routeParams, $compile, $http, $rootScope, $sce, $window, $location) {var data1 = $compile($(pagedef.datatemplate))($scope);$("#appContent").append(data1);}
pages.datatemplate: Sample Data
{{d.title}}
{{d.title}}

<style>
  #fixedHeaderContent {
    display: none;
  }
  
  .footerGroupIcons div div {
    -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
    /* Chrome, Safari, Opera */
    filter: grayscale(100%);
  }
  
  .divLMS {
    -webkit-filter: grayscale(0%) !important;
    /* Chrome, Safari, Opera */
    filter: grayscale(0%) !important;
    /*border-bottom: 3px solid #1a5448 !important;*/
    color: #1a5448 !important;
    opacity: 1 !important;
  }
  
  .divLMS a div.openSans {
    -webkit-filter: grayscale(0%) !important;
    /* Chrome, Safari, Opera */
    filter: grayscale(0%) !important;
    color: #1a5448 !important;
  }
  
  @import url(http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,700italic,300,400,700);
  .openSans {
    font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
    height: 100%;
  }
  
  .scrollable-content {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100% !important;
    padding: 0;
    overflow: hidden;
    -webkit-transition-duration: .2s, .2s;
    transition-duration: .2s, .2s;
    -webkit-transition-property: top, bottom;
    transition-property: top, bottom;
    -webkit-transition-timing-function: linear, linear;
    transition-timing-function: linear, linear;
  }
  
  #appContent {
    height: 100% !important;
  }
  
  .backButtonArrow {
    display: none;
  }
  
  .navbar-absolute-bottom {
    top: auto;
    bottom: 0;
    border-bottom: 0 none;
    border-top-width: 1px;
    min-height: 0 !important;
    height: 0 !important;
  }
  
  .navbar-absolute-top {
    top: 0;
    border-bottom-width: 0px !important;
  }
  
  .app-body {
    padding-bottom: 0px !important;
  }
  
  #mainSidebar .appgroup {
    display: none;
  }
</style>
